trends: There have been no other sightings in Diss
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright and iluminating orb like object.
divs: sighting detailsit was exactly 7-45 pm and i was parking my van at the side of my house in the drive.oposite my property entrance were three local youngsters,"look at the ufo" one said.i turned and looked into the dark sky and i was amazed by the glowing light emiting from this odject.it appeared to be stationary at a hight of what looked like 500 to 700 feet some mile and a half away.my response was,"its a helicopter probably the police abserving the trafic on the bypass" the three young chaps all afixed by this said it had been ther for ages. i went indoors and unpacked my lunch bag and decided to look again.it was absolutly statioary,i quickly dismissed the helicopter theory as it was not wavering or moving at all,it was fairly breezy and the pilot even the best would have had to make some movement to keep its possition. i then returned indoors and got out the camcorder and set up a tripod on the upstairs rear bedroom window ledge. it was now starting to move very slowly south easterly and rising in the sky. the light it was emitting seemed to be contained within a circular orb changing colour and intensity.when i zoomed in i colud clearly depict a sold looking horizontal mass at about two thirds from the bottom of the ball like mass.my tripod is the cheapest crap tripod anyone could heve and i was having dificulty in tracking the object as my movements were too jerky.i found if i tapped the tripod slightly i was able to keep fixed on the object better.so on the video i shot the object is reasonably stable untill i try to re-focus i filmed this for about a 1\4 hour before my battery went flat.i called my daughter who lives about a mile from me and she too went outside to observe. since sighting this i have tried to get some more info but no one seems to take it seriously untill they see my film. go to http:\\lookingout.atspace.com\ for four seperate single frame images.
